item.title: VOD servers
item.description: Video on Demand Streaming Server Locations We are hosting the vod files on several systems around the world and deliver video streams directly without the use of a CDN. You can read more about his decision in Alex’ blogpost: http://www.mcwilliam.biz/blog/vastly-improve-your-video-delivery-by-ridding-your-cdn Most systems are bare metal servers from Softlayer or Hetzner, some are virtual machines provided by IIJ. Every system hosts the complete DCH video archive, meaning every content that requires a user to have at least a registration to be played.
